Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 about crowdsourcing and efficient ways to label a collection of data
Crowdsourcing Data Labeling: A Survey
This article provides a comprehensive survey of crowdsourcing for data labeling, including the benefits and challenges of using this approach

This article discusses efficient methods for crowdsourcing data labeling, including techniques for optimizing the labeling process and reducing costs

This article compares the performance of different crowdsourcing platforms for data labeling, including Amazon Mechanical Turk, Crowdflower, and HITs

This article discusses techniques for efficiently labeling large-scale image datasets using crowdsourcing, including data augmentation and active learning
